titles.title: To authorize appropriations for the National Tropical Botanical Garden, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E870)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
5/8/2008--Introduced.
Authorizes appropriations for FY2008-FY2017 to the National Tropical Botanical Garden for operation and maintenance expenses. Requires such funds to be matched on a one-to-one basis by non-federal funds.
